name: AVPlayerPlaybackCoordinator
desc: A playback coordinator subclass that coordinates the playback of player objects in a connected group.

items.name: var player: AVPlayer?
items.desc: A player that participates in coordinated playback.

items.name: var delegate: AVPlayerPlaybackCoordinatorDelegate?
items.desc: A delegate object for the playback coordinator.

items.name: protocol AVPlayerPlaybackCoordinatorDelegate
items.desc: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to participate in playback coordination.
